rules_text:
Create a 4/4 blue, black, and red Dragon creature token with flying. If you cast this spell from your graveyard, put a decayed counter on that token. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
Flashback {U}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
